bSharedProfile: Whether or not this profile should be stored in the Project ini file
bUseSkyLighting: Whether or not image based lighting is enabled for the environment cube map
DirectionalLightIntensity: Manually set the directional light intensity (0.0 - 20.0)
DirectionalLightColor: Manually set the directional light colour
SkyLightIntensity: Manually set the sky light intensity (0.0 - 20.0)
bRotateLightingRig: Toggle rotating of the sky and directional lighting, press K and drag for manual rotating of Sky and L for Directional lighting
bShowEnvironment: Toggle visibility of the environment sphere
bShowFloor: Toggle visibility of the floor mesh
EnvironmentColor: The environment color, used if Show Environment is false.
EnvironmentIntensity: The environment intensity (0.0 - 20.0), used if Show Environment is false.
EnvironmentCubeMap: Sets environment cube map used for sky lighting and reflections
bPostProcessingEnabled: Whether or not the Post Processing should influence the scene
LightingRigRotation: Current rotation value of the sky in degrees (0 - 360)
RotationSpeed: Speed at which the sky rotates when rotating is toggled
